# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds immense value for those seeking excellence in their endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I am extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $18000. This offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to achieving superior results. I look forward to discussing how this product can elevate your projects or business to new heights. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
